mapper.select: SELECT t.*, m.group_name, m.count, m.open_date, u.name, count(*)-1 "apply_mentee_count" FROM Team t join mentor_apply m on t.group_m_apply_id = m.id left join user u on m.mentor_u_id = u.id WHERE m.m_condition=0 and m.open_date between #{param1} and #{param2} group by t.group_m_apply_id

SELECT t.*, m.group_name, m.count, m.open_date, u.name, count(*)-1 'apply_mentee_count', m.mentor_u_id FROM Team t join mentor_apply m on t.group_m_apply_id = m.id left join user u on m.mentor_u_id = u.id group by t.group_m_apply_id HAVING m.group_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%');
